thread.title: W Foshay and Chambers hotels to be sold
thread.title_full: W Foshay and Chambers hotels to be sold

author: Sam Black
title: W Foshay and Chambers hotels to be sold
text:
Deal of the week Subscriber Content W Foshay and Chambers hotels to be sold Jul 3, 2015, 5:00am CDT Minneapolis / St. Paul Business Journal Share Nancy Kuehn | MSPBJ The W Minneapolis Hotel opened in 2008 in the Foshay Tower downtown. W Minneapolis Hotel - The Foshay and Le Meriden Chambers Minneapolis, two prominent full-service hotels in Minneapolis, are under contract to be sold for $101 million, a record price for Minnesota hotels. Subscribe now to Nancy Kuehn | MSPBJ The W Minneapolis Hotel opened in 2008 in the Foshay Tower downtown. W Minneapolis Hotel - The Foshay and Le Meriden Chambers Minneapolis, two prominent full-service hotels in Minneapolis, are under contract to be sold for $101 million , a record price for Minnesota hotels. The Le Meridien Chambers… more Related Content Motivation: Ashford, which already owns two full-service suburban Twin Cities hotels, bought the downtown properties as part of its strategy to focus solely on full-service holdings and to sell its limited-service hotels. Property details: The 229-room W Minneapolis was built in 2008 within historic Foshay Tower at 821 Marquette Ave. The W includes a 6,700-square-foot meeting space, an open-air observation deck and a ground-floor restaurant space leased to Manny’s Steakhouse. The 60-room Le Meridian Chambers at 901 Hennepin opened in 2006 in a five-story building constructed in 1908. The hotel, known for its contemporary art collection, is also the home of Marin Restaurant & Bar. Why it matters: At a record $349,000 per room for the pair of hotels, the price exceeds the $315,000 per room ($67.4 million total) paid in February for the Westin Minneapolis and $255,000 per room ($65 million total) paid for the Loews Minneapolis last year , according to data from Real Capital Analytics, a New York-based real estate investment deal tracking firm. 
Want Minneapolis / St. Paul Travel
